full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: TBIPS A.6 Programmer/Software Developer - Level 3

## Announcement Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-25T14:00:00 (closed)
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) and Social Science and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Tamara Bennett
	+ [tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca](mailto:tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca)
	+ (343) 573-1961

## Tender Details

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Industry Classification**: Information Technology Service Delivery [81160000]
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others
* **Geographic Coverage**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Description

The NSERC and SSHRC are seeking innovative technology solutions aligned with existing or future enterprise and solution architectures. The SharePoint platform is the primary portal for Agency staff collaboration and web content management. The selected contractor will develop solutions to improve intranet and internet presences.

## Attachments

The tender package can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7618/20230538_-_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7618/20230538_-_apn.pdf) in English or French. *Note: The tender is now expired and not open for bidding.*
